thread.section_title: Rover.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rover.com | rover.com | 2 of 140
thread.title: Jaime

author: Jaime
title: Jaime
text: Rover has been a lifesaver for me since I have recently gone back to work and needed someone to check in on my two dogs during the day. It was easy arrange to meet several background-checked dog sitters in my area and they were all very responsive. Now, I just book & pay online for the days I need service at my convenience. I get a message and updates including photos while the dog sitter is at my house. My dogs are happy and I'm happy. It can be a little difficult to find what you are looking for on the website at first, but that is a minor complaint.
